name: Fetch Website Content
description: Fetches the content of a website and stores it in an SQLite database, updating if already present.

sqlTables.name: website_content
sqlTables.definition: CREATE TABLE website_content (url TEXT PRIMARY KEY, content TEXT, last_updated DATETIME DEFAULT CURRENT_TIMESTAMP)

sqlQueries.name: Get recent content updates
sqlQueries.query: SELECT * FROM website_content ORDER BY last_updated DESC LIMIT 10
